summary: Dental clinic website with appointment booking (form-based, no login required, with success animation), premium animations (floating hero, magnetic buttons, staggered text reveal, liquid blue gradient background, scroll progress line), and Admin Panel.
architectural_notes: Appointment booking form saves directly to backend with no external service dependency and no login required for patients

existing_features.title: Fix the appointment booking form in BookAppointmentDialog.tsx so that form submissions save directly to the backend actor (no external service). On successful submit, display a green checkmark animation with the text 'Appointment Confirmed!' instead of the current error state. Ensure no Internet Identity login prompt or auth barrier appears for patients during booking â€” the form must be fully accessible to anonymous users.

Add a floating animation to the Hero section: a dental icon or doctor image should continuously float up and down (bob effect) when the page loads. The animation should be smooth and loop indefinitely.

Make all 'Book Now' buttons magnetic: when the user's mouse cursor moves near a 'Book Now' button, the button should subtly translate toward the cursor, creating a magnetic attraction effect. The button should return to its original position when the cursor moves away.

Add a staggered text reveal animation to all major section headings: each word in the heading should animate in one by one from below (bounce/slide up), creating a staggered entrance effect when the section scrolls into view.

Replace the static white background with a dynamic liquid blue gradient background. The gradient should animate continuously and create a wave/fluid effect that responds to mouse movement across the page.

Add a scroll-triggered progress indicator: a thin animated line (progress bar) fixed at the top of the page that fills from left to right as the user scrolls down, indicating how much of the page content remains.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix appointment booking: use direct backend (no external service), green checkmark animation + 'Appointment Confirmed!' message on submit, no login barrier
Floating hero animation: dental icon/doctor image floats up-down in hero section on load
Magnetic Book Now buttons: buttons attract toward cursor when mouse is nearby
Staggered text reveal: heading words bounce in one by one from bottom to top
Liquid blue gradient background that creates wave effect on mouse movement
Scroll-triggered progress line animation showing how much of the page has been scrolled
